(I'll post CF damage now, but I won't be home over the weekend. I'm going to 
Boston for the next four days (Fri-Mon) I'll be able to post again on 
Tuesday. Until then, happy posting!)

Hysteria:

Hysteria, not recieving a reply from IR, assumed the situation had become 
rather extreme. She reinforced the shields with what little extra power 
remained and turned to run down the hall just as the ship shook from the 
force of The Brotherhood's combined attacks:

CF comp: Shields at 85% and holding

Hysteria stopped midway down the hall and opened a compartment neatly 
concealed behind a large panel. She grabbed a box of equipment and took off 
down the CF. The pitiful mew of something caught her attention. SHe knew she 
didn't have the time to stop, but looked up anyway. It was the kitten IR had 
been carrying earlier. Hysteria sighed, then shouted up to it:

"C'mon cat. I'll take you to IR."

Hysteria cast it one last glance over her shoulder and then continued down 
the hall. It was up to the cat whether or not it followed. She eventually 
made her way up several levels until she came to a ladder. She climbed up, 
and hoisted the large case over her head as she simultaneuosly pushed open 
the hatch leading to the top of the CF and climbed out.
